import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; import { format } from "date-fns"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar'; import MailList from '../../components/mailList/MailList'; import Footer from '../../components/footer/Footer'; import './booking.css' const Booking = () => { const location = useLocation(); const [date, setDate] = useState(location.state.date); const user = location.state.user; const hotel = location.state.hotel; const [room, setRoom] = useState({}); let rooms = []; useEffect(() => { for (let i = 0; i < hotel.rooms.length; i++){ const roomId = { id: hotel.rooms[i] } const post = () => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/room', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(roomId), headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data); rooms.push(room); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); } post(); } }, []) console.log(rooms); return (

{hotel.name}

{hotel.desc}

${hotel.cheapestPrice} (1 night)

Dates

setDate([item.selection])} showSelectionPreview = {true} ranges={date} direction="horizontal" />

Reserve Info

Select Rooms

Budget Double Room

Pay nothing until Septermber 04, 2000

Max people : 2

$350

Pay nothing until Septermber 04, 2000

$350

Total Bill: $700

) }; export default Booking;
